transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, Jaisingh sir baat kar rahe ho?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, main toh ye baat kar rahi hu, aap se baat hui thi unhi ne.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir kal actually hamari team jab live karti hai na, toh woh approval lena hota hai use. Toh sir aapko call kiya tha, sir aap available nahi the.
Toh woh last approval jab hota hai na, toh on the spot aap se call karke puchte hai ki hum live kar rahe hai, jaise aap kehte ho yes hum live kar dete hai.
Toh waha se automatically live ho jata hai. Toh kal unfortunately baat nahi ho paayi thi sir se bhi nahi ho paayi. Sir ko call kiya.
Toh sir ne aapka yehi bola tha ki ek baar aap se baat kar le. Toh I think aap bahar the kal kahi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh sir ye hum kaise aap bhi apna use karte ho, toh aapka jo number hai ye wala. Ye bhi aap isme attach kara dijiye secondary ki do number mandatory hota hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh number woh.
Executive: Lagega toh hum baad mein kar lenge na attach, abhi jarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm, acha toh koi aur ek number, kyuki ek hi number hai kya isse kya hota hai na, expose mein jab calls aati hai land hoti hai, toh usme aapka ek number toh primary mein hai, but expose mein network issue na ho, koi problem na ho, toh uske liye ek number aur mandatory hota hai. Toh agar woh aap add karenge toh aapke paas incoming call hai woh sab land hona start hoti hai na. Toh uske liye ki maan lijiye sir, primary mein toh sir ka number hi rahega, usme koi issue nahi hai. Woh toh first number hai. But secondary mein woh backend support mein kyuki like agar unse reach nahi hui toh aapka number bhi ring ho sakta hai. Toh at least aapka customer bahar expose ka woh kharab nahi hoga.
Customer: Nahi mera mera number hi kam lagta hai, sir ka number hi jyada lagta hai mam, toh wohi possibility achi hai ki sir ka hi number rahe toh.
Executive: Sir ka toh rahega, sir ka toh primary mein sir ka hi number hai. Ha wohi toh main additional mujhe ye toh nahi karna.
Executive: Actually kya hota hai, jo PNS number hote hai woh maximum to maximum three to four number add hote hai. Toh agar sir kahi koi aur number ho. Ya aap aisa kar sakte ho sir aap apna number add kar sakte ho. Baad mein agar aapko lage ki aapko hatana hai, agar aapko lag raha hai future mein jarurat nahi hai, toh aap use remove bhi kar sakte ho. Woh toh aapke according hai na, ye cheeze hai.
Customer: Toh hum baad mein kar lenge na mam additional mein add hum agar number lagega toh mam.
Executive: Hmm, ye sir kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Hum baad mein kar lenge na mam number additional mein, abhi toh sir ka hi rehne dijiye aap usme primary mein aur additional mein baad mein kar lenge hum, sir ka number lagta hai ki.
Executive: Jaise maan lijiye uske liye approval lena hota hai, approval aap hi doge na matlab ki live karne ka.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ki live hone ke liye. Approval kyuki sir ko call kiya, sir ne kaha ki approval Jaisingh hi denge.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ki matlab live kar de, pura confirmation call par.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh hamari jo team hogi woh confirmation ke liye aapko call karegi. Toh usme aapka number hona bhi mandatory hai na. Toh abhi se agar aap add kara do, baad mein agar aapko hatana hoga toh woh aapka decision rehta hai, aapko sir ka number add karna hai ya kisi aur ka number add karna hai. Woh toh aap use remove bhi kar sakte ho.
Customer: Sir theek hai ji kar dijiye mera phir aap additional.
Executive: Sir aap ek baar IndiaMART se open kariyega.
Customer: Ek minute karta hu.

Customer: Ji kar diya maine.
Executive: Toh usme dekhiye profile section aata hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Profile pe click kariyega, then usme additional detail aayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uspe aapka other information mein aapka number other number aap secondary number add kar sakte ho, usme option de raha hoga.
Customer: Mam isme additional contact information aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha ha usme right.
Customer: Toh phir contact person aur primary number.
Executive: Ha agar agar dekhiye primary number toh ek sir ka already hai na yaha par. First mein likha hua hai. Primary detail aata hai. Primary detail par aapka 281 wala usme ek aa raha hoga add alternate mobile number karke aa raha hai.
Jaise aap profile pe click karenge toh sabse upar dekhiye primary detail aa rahi hogi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Primary detail ke niche ownership aa raha hoga 281 number hai aur ek uske bagal mein add alternate mobile aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ha ha mam.
Executive: Uspe click kariyega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh usme dekhiye second number alternate mobile number karke.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Right uspe dekhiye.
Customer: Ji kar liya mam.
Customer: Ji ho gaya.
Executive: Add ho gaya sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Uspe dekhiye niche save ka option nahi aa raha hai? Save ka option aa raha hai. 719985157.
Customer: Ha save ka option aa raha hai mam.
Executive: Save kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Ha mam OTP jayega sir ke paas.
Executive: Hmm okay mail pe bhi option aa raha hai, mail pe bhi ja raha hai ya mobile number pe ja raha hai?
Customer: Mam mobile number pe hi ja raha hai.
Executive: Acha acha sir abhi office mein hai, aap unse confirm kar lenge sakte hai number sir?
Customer: Sir office mein nahi hai mam bahar hai main leta hu unse phone karke OTP.
Executive: Acha theek hai.

Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs to add an alternate mobile number.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to add alternate mobile number.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, alternate number, indiamart
